song.eTitle: LOVE OF GOD -- 1 John 4 and John 3, NKJV

verses.verse: In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him.
"For God did not send His Son into the world to condemn the world, but that the world through Him might be saved."
In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
God is love, and be who abides in love abides in God, and God in him.
Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
And this commandment we have from Him: that he who loves God must love his brother also.
